name: UTG:areamuseum
description:
PRIMARY. a teenage girl who collected her dreams for more than 3+ years.
by daydreaming, she is the main participant of her own dream journal,
exploring her emotions and thoughts that lay within those dreams.

CONTROLS
Arrow keys to move
Z or Enter to select, interact
X to cancel
Shift to bring up menu (nexus only)
Number Key 0 to force a wake up

NOTES
this game was inspired by LSD dream emulator, yume nikki, and it’s fangames.
for a dream game, I portrayed my own personal dreams. this game is basically a look around for my own dream journal. please be wise.

enjoy your stay...
